author: CALVIN WOODWARD Associated Press
title: Trump, aides, float outlier theory on origins of coronavirus
description: President Donald Trump and some of his officials are stepping up efforts to pin blame on China for the coronavirus pandemic
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
President Donald Trump and some of his officials are flirting with an outlier theory that the new coronavirus was set loose on the world by a Chinese lab that let it escape. Without the weight of evidence, theyre trying to blame China for sick… [+5173 chars]
